pages.title: Chrome Dust
pages.text: Chrome Dust is a resource that naturally generates in the overworld, from Y level -64 up to Y level 48, and in the Nether, from Y level 10 to Y level 120.$(br)It's weak by itself, but when it's mixed into with other materials the resultant alloy is stronger and nigh impervious to external agents.
Can be used to craft Steel Ingots and Advanced Alloy Ingots
